metadata.inclusion: For adding the device to the Z-Wave network the triple click of the Set button is needed
metadata.exclusion: To remove the device from the Z-Wave network click the Set button trice again
metadata.reset:
Hold the Set button pushed for 5 seconds, then push it three times shortly. The Z-Wave indicator alternately flashes red and green. After that the triple-click is needed.
Please use this procedure only when the network primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable
